caption: A woman is walking outdoors, and a man catches up with her. They walk together on the grassy field and engage in conversation. Soon, they share a kiss. Suddenly, the weather changes from sunny to pouring rain, accompanied by thunder and lightning. The man and the woman run together in the rain. Eventually, they make it back indoors. They embrace and continue kissing. This scene is witnessed by an elderly woman upstairs. After the weather clears up, the woman and the old lady are back in an open area. The man arrives on horseback from a distance. Some people gather indoors. The woman picks up a wedding dress and puts it on.
